pkgmetadata.longdescription: Regularized Principal Component Analysis for Spatial Data // Provide regularized principal component analysis incorporating smoothness, sparseness and orthogonality of eigenfunctions by using the alternating direction method of multipliers algorithm (Wang and Huang, 2017, DOI:10.1080/10618600.2016.1157483). The method can be applied to either regularly or irregularly spaced data, including 1D, 2D, and 3D.
